overview:
Renee Barton has lead the companyâ€™s operational and financial functions since inception. Mrs. Barton also manages human resource and business development relations.

Mrs. Barton has over 15 years of experience in operations, investor relations and securities trading. She served as VP, chief of staff to the CEO and founder of BEA Systems for over 5 years and spent the first 2 years at the company as director of investor relations. Prior to that she held investor relations roles at various companies and worked at Charles Schwab in Bond Sales and Trading as well as Retirement Planning.
